name: Nature Particle Systems for Unity3D
description:
This Nature Particle Systems package has several particle effects with nature magic, such as nature roots, aura, orb and more!

Improve your game and enhance the visuals with these particle systems.
Full package: https://gw1p.itch.io/magic-particle-effects
(HAS NOT BEEN TESTED FOR MOBILE)

Free demo available

Hope you enjoy!
